<a id="ScriptEditorBase"></a>

# ScriptEditorBase

**Inherits:** [VBoxContainer](VBoxContainer.md) **\<** [BoxContainer](BoxContainer.md) **\<** [Container](Container.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Base editor for editing scripts in the [ScriptEditor](ScriptEditor.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Base editor for editing scripts in the [ScriptEditor](ScriptEditor.md). This does not include documentation items.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-signal -->

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ScriptEditorBase_signal_request_save_history"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**request_save_history**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ScriptEditorBase_signal_request_save_history)

Emitted when the user contextual goto and the item is in the same script.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ScriptEditorBase_signal_request_save_previous_state"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**request_save_previous_state**\ (\ state\: [Dictionary](Dictionary.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ScriptEditorBase_signal_request_save_previous_state)

Emitted when the user changes current script or moves caret by 10 or more columns within the same script.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<!-- classref-signal -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="ScriptEditorBase_method_add_syntax_highlighter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_syntax_highlighter**\ (\ highlighter\: [EditorSyntaxHighlighter](EditorSyntaxHighlighter.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ScriptEditorBase_method_add_syntax_highlighter)

Adds an [EditorSyntaxHighlighter](EditorSyntaxHighlighter.md) to the open script.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ScriptEditorBase_method_get_base_editor"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Control](Control.md) **get_base_editor**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#ScriptEditorBase_method_get_base_editor)

Returns the underlying [Control](Control.md) used for editing scripts. For text scripts, this is a [CodeEdit](CodeEdit.md).
